This file only exists to compile the main manuscript documents. 

```{r compile-vignettes, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)


outdir = tempfile(pattern = "dir")
dir.create(outdir)
file.copy(from = system.file("manuscript", 
                     package = "MoreyHoekstra2019"),
          to = outdir, recursive = TRUE)

infile = file.path(outdir, "manuscript", "manuscript.Rmd")
outfile = file.path(outdir, "manuscript", "manuscript.pdf")
rmarkdown::render(input = infile,
                  output_file = outfile)
file.copy(outfile, ".")

infile = file.path(outdir, "manuscript", "supplementA.Rmd")
outfile = file.path(outdir, "manuscript", "supplementA.html")
rmarkdown::render(input = infile,
                  output_file =  outfile)
file.copy(outfile, ".")

infile = file.path(outdir, "manuscript", "supplementB.Rmd")
outfile = file.path(outdir, "manuscript", "supplementB.html")
rmarkdown::render(input = infile,
                  output_file =  outfile)
file.copy(outfile, ".")

```
